name: EDU
goal:
EDU is an intergovernmental organization (IGO) and Think Tank lobbying for increased humanitarian efforts in the field of education.

Official Intergovernmental Domain(s)
‣ WWW.EDU.INT

Affiliations and Memberships

‣ United Nations Global Compact (participant)
‣ United Nations Academic Impact (member)
‣ United Nations UN(DESA) (listed)
‣International Institute for Middle East and Balkan Studies (consultant)
‣Earth Charter Initiative (Costa Rica Campus)
interests: Education and training, Humanitarian aid and civil protection
euInitiatives:
European Union - Children of Peace.
European Commission's Humanitarian Aid and Civil Protection Department (ECHO)
Multi-Annual Indicative Program (MIP)
